summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to negotiate, execute, grant and convey permanent utility easement rights over, under and across a portion of Magnolia Park to King County for the purpose of installing, constructing, operating, maintaining, removing, repairing and replacing wastewater pipelines along with all connections, manholes and appurtenances thereto, together with the right of ingress to and egress from said portion of Magnolia Park, and to accept payment and reimbursement therefor.
